evaluation.tip: Acknowledge the professor's concern and share how you're feeling or what support you need.

conversation_context.content: Hey there! I just finished grading those quizzes and... honestly, I'm a bit worried about you.

I hear you, but I gotta be real with you—those last two quizzes were rough. 35 on the Data Structures quiz and 28 on the Algorithms one? That’s not just a bad day; it’s a pattern, and it’s pulling your overall grade down to around 45%. With the midterm in two weeks worth 30% of your final grade, we’re at a tipping point. I’m not trying to stress you out more, but if we don’t turn this around now, you’re looking at having to retake the whole course. I care about you, and I don’t want that to happen. So… how are you actually holding up?
